title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist in a Java file by pressing CtrlSpace, if there are no suggestions available, the file is still marked as modified (dirtied).
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as modified (dirtied).
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below:
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
3. Press CtrlSpace.
